title: The phone had the Google screen; Couldn't turn the phone off; Couldn't get to any other screen; The
content: I took the phone to Best Buy, where it was purchased.  They said they had never seen this before and to contact Google.  I just bought the phone in October.  I would like to return the phone and get my money back.  I am satisfied with neither the phone nor the 'almost unable to contact anyone or anything' customer service!
